com.pump.graphics

Interface DrawInstruction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GraphicInstruction, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDrawInstruction, BasicShapeInstruction

    public interface DrawInstruction
extends GraphicInstruction
    This instruction paints the stroke of a shape.

    The paint() method should render something equivalent to what these lines of code produce:
    g = (Graphics2D)g.create();
    g.clip(getClipping());
    g.setTransform(getTransform());
    g.setStroke(getStroke());
    g.setPaint(getStrokePaint());
    g.setComposite(AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER,opacity));
    g.draw(getShape());

    • Method Summary

      Returns the optional clipping.
      float getOpacity()
      Returns the opacity to use.

      java.awt.Stroke getStroke()
      The stroke to use.
      java.awt.Paint getStrokePaint()
      The paint to use.
      java.awt.geom.AffineTransform getTransform()
      The AffineTransform to render the stroked shape through.
      boolean isClipped()
      Whether the clippings (if it exists) intersects the stroked shape.
